content: Our finance practice was active during the third quarter, providing expert services in all of its areas of focus, including merger litigation in Delaware Chancery Court, in which our experts analyze issues related to material adverse events, the fairness of deal prices and industry conditions, matters arising from allegations of spoofing and manipulations of financial markets, securities fraud litigations, instances of instance -- insurance, I'm sorry, and investment litigation, including matters for insurance companies related to cost of insurance and the California lapse law and international arbitration and which our experts provide testimony on valuation and damages issues and venues around the world.
